plot: After kissing a stranger, Jenna wakes up to discover a nasty lesion on her lip. The doctor's initial diagnosis suggests a simple cold sore. But further tests reveal a much more sinister cause.
title: Cold Sore
plot_es: After kissing a stranger, Jenna wakes up to discover a nasty lesion on her lip. The doctor's initial diagnosis suggests a simple cold sore. But further tests reveal a much more sinister cause.
plot_en: After kissing a stranger, Jenna wakes up to discover a nasty lesion on her lip. The doctor's initial diagnosis suggests a simple cold sore. But further tests reveal a much more sinister cause.
